member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_FRAME_CODED_INTERLACE_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the interlace type of coded video frames.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_FRAME_CODED_INTERLACE_TYPE.D3D12_VIDEO_FRAME_CODED_INTERLACE_TYPE_NONE
member.summary: The coded frames are not interlaced, often referred to as "progressive".

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_FRAME_CODED_INTERLACE_TYPE.D3D12_VIDEO_FRAME_CODED_INTERLACE_TYPE_FIELD_BASED
member.summary: The coded frames may be interlaced.
